reviewText: She has some really good advice! I would suggest filming in a more cosmic/esoteric setting. It is like a lecture in a classroom but the material she discusses is really useful.

I attended this specific workshop Clearing negativity from your life...Melinda was fantastic. She explained the different ways negativity enters our life and provided very doable ways to banish it.  You will enjoy her easy way of tackling a complex enintity.  I consider myself lucky to have encountered Melinda Carver and grateful she shared some very creative solutions to coping with such an energy draining problem we all face in daily life
